dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT REGEXP_REPLACE(db.serial_no, '[[:cntrl:]]', '') Serial_Number, db.party_name Customer_Name, db.level_limit Device_Level, db.aops_cust_number AOPS_Number, db.program_type Program_Type, db.active_Status Active_Status, (SELECT attribute2 FROM xx_cs_mps_device_details WHERE db.serial_no=serial_no AND supplies_label='TONERLEVEL_BLACK' ) Black_Threshold, (SELECT attribute2 FROM xx_cs_mps_device_details WHERE db.serial_no=serial_no AND supplies_label='TONERLEVEL_MAGENTA' ) Magenta_Threshold, (SELECT attribute2 FROM xx_cs_mps_device_details WHERE db.serial_no=serial_no AND supplies_label='TONERLEVEL_CYAN' ) Cyan_Threshold, (SELECT attribute2 FROM xx_cs_mps_device_details WHERE db.serial_no=serial_no AND supplies_label='TONERLEVEL_YELLOW' ) Yellow_Threshold, db.managed_status Managed_Status FROM xx_cs_mps_device_b db WHERE SUBSTR(db.party_name,0,5) = 'RADIO'
